EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf)
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Equipped bows gain a +1 Enhancement bonus for each Arcane Archer core ability you possess. (This does not stack with the bow's existing Enhancement bonus.) All bows are treated as Implements in your hands, granting Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Morphic Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Morphic Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows deal bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Metalline Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Metalline Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all metallic damage reduction

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Aligned Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

Stance.Name: Aligned Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows bypass all alignment based damage reduction.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Shadow Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Secondary Imbue Toggle: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows. Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds. Passive: Equipped bows gains a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Damage Multiplier.

Stance.Name: Shadow Arrows
Stance.Description: +5% Doubleshot chance with bows

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Master of Imbuement
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +4 Dexterity, +20% Doubleshot

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Conjure Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate to create a stack of returning +1 arrows. These arrows are destroyed when you log out for an extended period of time.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): True strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Perform a ranged attack with +20 to-hit. Rank 2/3: You receive a +[2/4] Insight bonus to hit for [6/12] seconds. Activation cost: 2 spell points. Cooldown: 3 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Energy of the Wild
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[30/60/100] maximum spell points. Rank 3: You gain the Magical Training feat. Antirequisite: Cannot take Rank 3 if you already have the Magical Training feat.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 Seconds) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Elemental Arrows
Stance.Description: Your arrows are imbued with elemental damage of your choice. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Shock Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Awareness
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Listen, Search, Spot and to-hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Dispelling Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack that deals +[1/2/3][W] damage and dispels [1/2/3] beneficial effects from your target. (Activation Cost: 5 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Force Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with magical force. Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d4/1d6/1d6+(1d10-3d10 on crit) force damage and the Ghost Touch ability. (Activation Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Gaining additional Elemental Damage dice in the Arcane Archer tree increases Force Arrows dice. This damage also scales with Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Force Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with magical force. Your arrows gain On Hit: 1d8 force damage per Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Inferno Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +[0/1/2][W] damage. On Hit: Target gain 1 stack of Inferno (target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. This effect can stack 20 times, and loses one stack on expiration.) (Activation cost: 6 SP. Cooldown 3 seconds)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again, deal +1 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows), or: Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Shock Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Imbue dice Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Attack or Energy Resistance boost.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Attack Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[4/6/8] action boost bonus to hit for 20 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Energy Resistance Boost
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[5/10/15] action boost bonus to Energy Resistance for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Shattermantle Shot
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage. On hit: Target gains [1/2/3] stack of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times) on Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds. Will DC [10/14/18] + Half Character Level + Wisdom Modifier negates.) (Activation Cost: 4 SP. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Shattermantle Shot
DC.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +[1/2/3][W] damage. On hit: Target gains [1/2/3] stack of Reduced Spell Resistance (-1 Spell Resistance. This effect can stack 100 times) on Vorpal Hit: Shattermantle (-100 spell Resistance for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Terror Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) On Hit: Target is feared. (Will save vs. DC: 20 + Wisdom Modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Terror Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: You imbue your arrows with negative energy. (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) On Hit: Target is feared. On Vorpal: Target is subject to a Phantasmal Killer effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Soul Magic
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Every time you strike an enemy with your bow, you have a 15% chance to gain 10 temporary spell points that last for one minute. +10 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or Elemental Damage. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Frost Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Frost Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Frost ability, dealing 1d8 cold damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Shock Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Shock Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Imbue dice Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Banishing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell bonuses) On hit: Inflict Pull of Reality (-1 PRR/MRR, stacks up to 25 times. 5 stacks fade away every 3 seconds). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Banishing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Banish an extraplanar creature back to their home plane.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses) On Save: -10% Movement and Attack speed. Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Paralyzing Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) You imbue your arrows with paralyzing force. On Hit: Target is paralyzed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct. (Will save vs. DC 20 + Wisdom modifier + Enchantment Spell Bonuses). Passive: +1 bonus to DC of Enchantment Spells. On Hit: Inflicts Deconstructed (Reduced attack speed, -25% Fortification, -25% healing from Repair) Instant kill does not affect bosses.

DC.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Smiting Arrows
DC.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: (Activation Cost: 20 SP. Cooldown: 10 seconds) Your arrows gain On Vorpal: Destroy a construct.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Elemental Arrows IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four elemental arrow imbues (Can't choose the same type again), or Elemental Damage. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Corrosive Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Corrosive Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Corrosive ability, dealing 1d8 acid damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flaming Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Name: Flaming Arrows
Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Flaming ability, dealing 1d8 fire damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

Stance.Description: Arcane Archer Imbue Toggle: Your arrows gain the Shock ability, dealing 1d8 electrical damage per Imbue Dice on hit, scaling with Spell Power. Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Imbue dice Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Dexterity or Wisdom

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Dexterity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Dexterity

EnhancementSelection.Name: +1 Wisdom
EnhancementSelection.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Moonbow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While wielding a bow, once every 30 seconds you gain 20 temporary spell points for 10 seconds. +10 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Arrow of Slaying
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ranged Archery Attack: Performs a ranged attack with +250 damage. (This damage can be multiplied by critical hits.) (Cost: 20 spell points. Cooldown: 20 seconds.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Final Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The first enemy hit triggers an area attack that inflicts Vulnerability and deals damage. More injured enemies receive increased damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose one

EnhancementSelection.Name: Improved Elemental Arrows
EnhancementSelection.Description:
Your elemental arrow imbues gain On Critical: 1d10-3d10 elemental damage based on critical multiplier and an additional effect:
Corrosive Arrows: Your arrows gain the Destruction ability. Flaming Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Burning (Target takes 1d6 fire damage every 2 seconds for 6 second. This effect can stack 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.) Frost Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Target gains 1 stack of Lethargy (You have -1 to all Saving throws. Non-bosses also move and attack 5% slower. This effect stacks up to 5 times.) Shock Arrows: Your arrows gain On Critical Hit: Vulnerable (Target takes 1% more damage for 3 seconds. This effect stacks up to 20 times and loses one stack on expiration.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Elemental Damage
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Damage dice with Elemental Arrows (Corrosive, Frost, Shock, Flaming, Force) Passive: +5 Universal Spell Power

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Arcane Archer (Elf): Runebow
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Bows you wield gain an additional +2 enhancement bonus. This is considered a Magic Weapon effect. (Does not stack with the spell Enchant Weapons.)
